title: Men's Snow Ski Hiking Pants Waterproof Windproof Fleece Lined Reinforced Knees Winter Work Pants with Zipper Pocket
features: 【Warm fleece lining thermal】Water repellent windproof outdoor pants with fleece lining,keep you warm and dry in the cold and windy weather.
【ZIPPER POCKETS】Two zipper side pockets and one right rear pocket can store your valuables safely.Sturdy zippers won't break easily.
【PARTIAL ELASTIC WAIST】Comfortable partial elastic waist with belt loops better fit your waist.Easily adjust it to be comfortable.
【RIP STOP】 Wear resistant fabric,3D Cutting,Reinforced Knee design,Exquisite Stitching provides longevity performance.
【UTILITY PANTS】 This slim flannel lined pants is versatile for outdoor activities like hunting,mountaineering,climbing,camping,cycling,fishing,traveling,etc and casual everyday wear.
description: Arisonho Men's Outdoor Snow Ski Fishing Fleece Lined Insulated Soft Shell Winter Pants with Belt
: Are the pants warm? Winter pants wear this pants to sweep the snow, riding and hiking will feel cold?
: The warmth of this pants is very good. We upgraded our products this year, and the fleece used is longer than others, so the pants are softer and warmer.
: Is the pants elastic? Will it be tight when worn? Will it be very bloated?

: Pants have a certain stretch, Designed for outdoor sports, ergonomically designed, not tight to wear, free to move, fashion and not bloated. Perfect for winter outdoor sports like hiking,skiing, walking, camping, ect.
